install.author: The VirtueMart Development Team
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2005-2008 Soeren Eberhardt-Biermann. All rights reserved.

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-Text
param.description: This text will be displayed just above the Scroller.

param.name: NumberOfProducts
param.label: Number of Products
param.description: The Number of Products that are member of the Scrollshow

param.name: featuredProducts
param.label: Featured Products Only
param.description: Display only products that are featured (marked special)

param.name: ScrollSortMethod
param.label: In which Order the products shall be displayed?
param.description: Defines the display order of the products.

param.name: show_product_name
param.label: Show Product Name?
param.description: Defines wether the Name of the shown Product is displayed or not.

param.name: show_addtocart
param.label: Show Add-To-Cart Link?
param.description: Defines wether an Add-To-Cart Link is shown under the Product Image or not.

param.name: show_price
param.label: Show Prices?
param.description: Show or Hide the prices for the displayed Products

param.name: ScrollHeight
param.label: Scroll Height
param.description: Adjusts the scroll height.

param.name: ScrollWidth
param.label: Scroll Width
param.description: Adjusts the scroll width.

param.name: ScrollBehavior
param.label: Scroll Behavior
param.description: This should be left at scroll, unless you have a good reason to change it. The other options are there for completeness.

param.name: ScrollDirection
param.label: Scroll Direction
param.description: Adjusts the scroll direction.

param.name: ScrollAmount
param.label: Scroll Amount
param.description: Controls the amount of lines the scroller jumps.

param.name: ScrollDelay
param.label: Scroll Delay
param.description: Controls the speed of the scroller. The lower the number the faster the Scroller scrolls.

param.name: ScrollAlign
param.label: Scroll Align
param.description: Align the table position of your content items.

param.name: ScrollSpaceChar
param.label: Scroll SpaceChar
param.description: The HTML space character to use when scrolling left or right. Default is: space character [ ]

param.name: ScrollSpaceCharTimes
param.label: Scroll SpaceChar Times
param.description: The amount of times to display the Scroll SpaceChar.

param.name: ScrollLineChar
param.label: Scroll LineChar
param.description: The HTML line character to use when scrolling up or down. Default is: break [br]

param.name: ScrollLineCharTimes
param.label: Scroll LineChar Times
param.description: The amount of times to display the Scroll LineChar.

param.name: ScrollCSSOverride
param.label: Override CSS
param.description: Overrides your sites basic default CSS elements and enables the mammemters below. This must be set to yes to use the setting below.

param.name: ScrollTextAlign
param.label: Scroll Text Align
param.description: Align the text output of your content items.

param.name: ScrollTextWeight
param.label: Scroll Text Weight
param.description: Adjusts the text weight.

param.name: ScrollTextSize
param.label: Scroll Text Size
param.description: Adjusts the text size and is measured in pixels.

param.name: ScrollTextColor
param.label: Scroll Text Color
param.description: The text color hex value attribute (including the # [pound sign] ) or the IE color name.

param.name: ScrollBGColor
param.label: Scroll BackGround Color
param.description: The background color hex value attribute (including the # [pound sign] ) or the IE color name.

param.name: ScrollMargin
param.label: Scroll Margin
param.description: Adjusts the clear area around your text and is measured in pixels.

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
